title: Creat a font, basiks from A to Z?
content:
Hi Everyone!

Im a new member on this forum so I´ll ask my first question!:)

Does anybody know a tutorial on creating a font from scratch or good expertise advice will do fine! I have a greta dell of experience in grafikart but I think a missed a little basics in creating a good font. I´m mostly selflearned and done it in my way but I think I created shapes i a to complikated way. There ar of course basics that I do know that you first skecth the font on paper, but there are many questions, do experts for example use "crosslinepaper"Grid lines? (sorry my english, from Sweden) then scan it and draw it out in Illustrator. But there are many ways to do it in Illustrator. I just learned to use grids and "snap to grid" well I think you know what I mean now.  
Mayby I am to perfektionist I dont know. I just want a good rutin and perhaps a new way to design letters in more easier way.

My wish is if there is a basic videotuttorial (or other will do) from A to Z that really describes in detail how to acomplish a high quality font.
author: Bert68

comments.content: Brilliant! Thanx!:) From 3 to 6 is what I´m searching for. See if i have any luck of finding videotuttorials too to my colection.:)

Try chapter 8 of the book [Exploring Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203173757/http:/www.amazon.com/Exploring-Typography-Design-Exploration-Rabinowitz/dp/1401815057/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1239722831&sr=8-1) by Tova Rabinowitz. It literally takes you step-by-step through the process of creating a basic font.
